source_objects.title: Home Improvement & Gardening
source_objects.description: Discover new how-to projects and learn advice from other do-it-yourselfers to fix up your home.

items.title: Floral Design: Flower Arrangements for Container Gardens
items.headline: Create easy, stunning flower arrangements and be the talk of the neighborhood with your gorgeous composition of flowers!
objectives_summary: What it takes to create beautiful flower arrangements in container gardens
How to bring your own creativity out to create flower arrangements that truly reflect who you are
What to look for when buying flowers

items.title: Introduction to Building Better Soils
items.headline: Learn fundamental principles that guide soil health.
objectives_summary: Understand the relationship between soil health, plant productivity, and nutrition.
Name the 5 soil components that make up a healthy soil.
Carry out qualitative, on site assessments of soil texture and structure.

items.title: Getting Started with Chickens: from hatch to laying
items.headline: Learn how to choose your first chickens and raise them up to laying age.
objectives_summary: Choose your first chickens and raise them to laying age.
Decide what type of chickens you want to start with (hatching eggs to started pullets).
Understand what supplies and basic care the chicks will need from hatch to laying age.

items.title: Beekeeping 101: Organic, Natural, Traditional
items.headline: Complete instruction on keeping honey bees using organic, natural and traditional beekeeping techniques.
objectives_summary: Practice holistic beekeeping.
Confidently start your own treatment-free honey bee hive
Harvest honey from your own honey bee hive.

items.title: IOT enabled hydroponics indoor automated system
items.headline: Learn to build own indoor hydroponics system and control it remotely through IOT
objectives_summary: Understand the basics of hydroponics
Can able to grow their own plant in your home
Remotely control and monitor your growing system using IOT

items.title: Advanced Drip Irrigation - Field Installations
items.headline: Water Management in the Landscape
objectives_summary: At the end of this course you'll have a greater understanding of how to lay out and install in-line drip irrigation systems.
You will learn how to use inline drip irrigation for ornamental shrub beds
You will learn how to use inline drip irrigation for vegetable gardens

items.title: Growing Great Seedlings
items.headline: Everything you need to know about growing great seedlings
objectives_summary: How to Grow Great Seedlings

items.title: Bee Ecology: a Simple Guide for Bee Caring in your Backyard
items.headline: Learn about the amazing diversity of bees: from solitary bees to honeybees.  An essential guide for bee conservation
objectives_summary: Bees diversity
Bee conservation in your backyard
Pollination:  a love story

items.title: Zen Beekeeping for the Beginner

visible_instructors.name: Susan
visible_instructors.job_title: Head Beekeeper and Co-Owner of Butts' Bees Apiary
visible_instructors.title: Susan Butts

items.headline: Honey Bees and Being the Beekeeper: Learn Beekeeping as a Path to Zen
objectives_summary: You will understand beekeeping terminology
Know the types of equipment and how to choose what is right for you
Comprehend brief bee biology

items.title: Growing Potatoes in your backyard garden
items.headline: A complete guide to gardening potatoes in your own vegetable garden
objectives_summary: When you are finished with this course you will know everything you need to get a great crop of potatoes planted this year.

items.title: Aquaponic System Farming and Gardening Design Course
items.headline: Crash Course: Study, design and build your own aquaponics system, farm or garden, grow plants and fish together!
objectives_summary: Design an aquaponic system and farm
Understand fundamental principles of aquaponics
Practical problems in an aquaponic system or a farm

items.title: Food Forest Design & Care for Cities and Suburbs
items.headline: Design and build a permaculture food forest in your backyard, neighborhood, or city
objectives_summary: By the end of this course you will be able to incorporate food forests into the design of your home, neighborhood, or city
In this course you will learn what food forests are, what permaculture is, and how to incorporate food forests into city & suburbs
You'll learn about soil building by zone, cover crops, swales, and other permaculture techniques

items.title: Home Repair Made Easy

visible_instructors.title: Beth Allen
visible_instructors.job_title: DIY Expert, Contractor, Interior Designer & Spokesperson
visible_instructors.name: Beth

items.headline: DIY Tips to Save Money, Time and Aggravation on Common Home Reapirs
objectives_summary: Tackle common, easy Do It Yourself Home Repairs
Problem solve and fix clogs, jammed garbage disposers, tripped circuits, carpet stains, toilet rings and more
Identify when to call a professional for repairs

items.title: Woodworking: Router Table Essentials

visible_instructors.name: George
visible_instructors.job_title: Managing Editor & Instructor of Woodworkers Guild of America
visible_instructors.title: George Vondriska

items.headline: This course will give you many important tips and fundamentals – helping you to get the most out of your router table
objectives_summary: This woodworking course provides many important tips & fundamentals to get the most out of your router table.
Safety tips including properly securing the bit, determining feed direction and more.
How to properly maintain your router table and bits for the most effective use.

items.title: Propagation of ornamental plants
items.headline: Learn how to propagate and grow on common ornamental plants
objectives_summary: At the end of the course, students will be able to propagate common garden plants.

items.title: Intro to Permaculture
items.headline: Exploring the Fundamental Principles, History & Evolution of the Permaculture Movement
objectives_summary: What is Permaculture and Why it Matters
Permaculture's Powerful Vision for Individuals & the World
The Iconic Figures Who Inspired, Formed & Expanded Permaculture
